{{Wireless embedded system |brand=3Com |model=3CRWE50194 |revision= |upc= |ean= |asin=B000BZTYMO |price=274 |est_release_date= |fcc_date=10/27/2000 |manuf_country=Taiwan |is_manuf=No |manuf=Accton |manuf_model=WG3002-32 |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=wireless router |fcc_id=DF63CRWE50194 |ic_id=22991032280A |us_id= |pwr_v=6 |pwr_amp=2 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_ac_hz= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=Samsung |cpu1_model=S3C4510 |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1=2 |fla1_brand=Intel |fla1_model=TE28F800B3BA90 |fla1_num=2 |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1=4 |ram1_brand=EtronTech |ram1_model=EM636165TS-10 |ram1_num=2 |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module=Eumitcom WL11000SA-D |wi1_module_if=Ethernet |wi1_chip1_brand=Atmel |wi1_chip1_model=AT76C510 |wi1_chip2_brand=Intersil |wi1_chip2_model= |wi1_chip3_brand=Intersil |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=b |wi1_ant_conn=unknown |wi1_txchains= |wi1_rxchains= |wi1_sstreams= |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand=Davicom |eth_chip2_model=DM9008F |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=Kendin |sw_model=KS8995 |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=3 |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips= |flags= |stock_os=VxWorks |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=b |default_ssid=101 |default_ssid_regex=^101$ |default_ip=192.168.2.1 |default_user= |default_pass= |oui=00:01:03 |oui_eth=00:01:03 }} '''HomeConnect''' ''Home Wireless Gateway'' (HWG)
[http://download.modem-help.co.uk/mfcs-U/USR/3CRWE50194/ Downloads on m-h] :The stock OS appears to be '''VxWorks'''.
The old '''3Com''' logo, "P/N: 143302-401 REV: 01", and "MADE IN TAIWAN R.O.C." is silkscreened on the main board. :The board is using '''Gloira''' (small ones) and '''TAICON''' (big ones) capacitors. This device is using a '''Eumitcom''' WL11000SA-D module (the board used in the [[Eumitcom WA3001A]], AT76C510 based) connected to the main board via the '''Kendin''' switch.
[http://web.archive.org/web/20030515013436/http://www.uninett.no/wlan/product_test/3com-hwg.html Test of the device on uninett.no (via archive.org)] (via [http://www.dslreports.com/forum/r7495026-3Comr-Home-Wireless-Gateway-3CRWE50194-firmware this dslreports forum post]) :OEM is noted as '''AMIT'''
[http://www.practicallynetworked.com/review.asp?pid=292 Reviewed on Practically Networked] (2001-02-21) [http://www.practicallynetworked.com/item.asp?pid=292 Product spec. page on Practially Networked] :10/100 LAN (switched), 10Mbit WAN :WLAN chipset noted as PRISM II
[http://www.manualowl.com/m/3Com/3CRWE50194/Manual/297151 Manual on ManualOwl] :Per the manual, the default SSID is '''101'''.
